name: Momentum Infotech
overview:
Momentum Infotech designs & builds outstanding websites, desktop and mobile software applications that stand out from the crowd.

Since 2001, Momentum Infotech’s talented team has helped hundreds of clients in a wide array of industries. Our company is domestically and internationally located in New York / New Jersey metropolitan and Toronto with an offshore development centre (ODC) based in Ludhiana, India.

Specialties: Web Development, Mobile App Development, Custom SharePoint Development, Website Design, .NET C#, iPhone App Development, Silverlight & WPF, Flash, MS SQL, PHP, MySQL, HTML5, Outsourcing, Staff Augmentation, ASP.NET MVC, Windows Software Development, Android Development and the like.
